articles.content: IND vs AUS, 4th Test, Day 3 Highlights: Shubman Gill dazzled with a century, while Virat Kohli hit an unbeaten fifty as India managed to reach 289/3 against Australia at stumps on Day 3 of the fourth… [+1403 chars]

articles.title: PM Albanese's response to attacks on Hindu temples in Australia: ‘We don’t…' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Australia PM Anthony Albanese On Attacks on Hindu Temples: Earlier, PM Narendra Modi said that the Australian PM had assured that the safety and well-being of the Indian community in Australia is a priority for him. | World News
articles.content: Australian prime minister Anthony Albanese said that the country will not tolerate any extreme actions or attacks against religious places and there is no place for such action against Hindu temples,… [+1498 chars]
